name: Dig (mj.Jernigan)
description:
New Mexico Game Jam 2019

Small test of RPG Maker for complex storytelling.

You're in a desert occupied by people who dig holes.

Unfinished with "To be continued..." just before it should get more interesting.  The "world" is a bit punishing to navigate too... on purpose.

With 17 hours of work, I almost finished the first part of what was intended to be a three-part short story/adventure.  This leaves the question: Should I continue the story?
